```{r population data}

View(population_parameters_rates_by_district)

Population_data_1 <- population_parameters_rates_by_district %>%
  select(`Nome_distrito`, `Pop_1991`, `Pop_2000`, `Pop_2010`, `Pop_2020`, `Pop/ha_1991`, `Pop/ha_2000`, `Pop/ha_2010`) 


Pop_growth_rates <- population_parameters_rates_by_district %>%
  select(`Nome_distrito`, `Tx_cresc91/2000`, `Tx_cresc2000/10`, `Tx_cresc2010/20`)


```


```{r}

as_tibble(Pop_growth_rates)
head(Pop_growth_rates)


Growth_rates <- ggplot(aes(x = Pop_growth_rates$`Nome_distrito`, y = `Tx_cresc91/2000`, y2 = `Tx_cresc2000/10`, y3 = `Tx_cresc2010/20`), type = "S", pch = 19, 
     col = "red",  xlab = "District Name", ylab = "Population growth")
```
